DataElement.preferredName: Person Clinical Study Treatment Begin Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/registered indicator whether a person has registered to or started treatment on a clinical trial, research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects, as an element of a personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Clinical Study Treatment Begin Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person having begun treatment as part of clinical trial, research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects, as an element of a personal medical history which is necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Clinical Study Therapy Begin Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, mechanism of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiology, behavior and health services research. :An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.
Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/registered indicator whether an event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Is the patient registered to
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient registered to or started treatment on the respective treatment trial?
